snippet: Brazilian Olympic organizers are showing “great dynamism” to overcome the delays that have plagued the 2016 Games in Rio de Janeiro, said Thomas Bach, the president of the International Olympic Committee.
abstract: International Olympic Committee president Thomas Bach warns that time is of the essence as Brazilian Olympic organizers continue to prepare for the 2016 Olympics.
lead_paragraph: Brazilian Olympic organizers are showing “great dynamism” to overcome the delays that have plagued the 2016 Games in Rio de Janeiro, said Thomas Bach, the president of the International Olympic Committee.
